question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: Jakie nowe oznaczenie otrzymało Bath w 2021 r. w związku z UNESCO?
answer: W 2021 roku Bath razem z wieloma inny miejscami na świecie zostało włączone do nowego wyróżnienia UNESCO dla "Great Spa Towns of Europe".
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath, along with many other places around the world, was included in the new UNESCO distinction for 'Great Spa Towns of Europe'.
